name: Terri's Spicy Vegetable Smoothie
author: Terri Myers
summary: This is so healthy and delicious, I could drink it every day. Compare to commercial vegetable juice; this has no added salt and doesn't need it. Switch up your veggies, fruits and spices and try different combinations.
ingredients: ½ cup fresh spinach, or more to taste
1 pinch salt-free seasoning blend (such as Mrs. Dash® Southwest Chipotle), or to taste
1 dash hot sauce (such as Frank's RedHot ®), or to taste
1 dash Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
directions: Combine spinach, carrot, celery, tomato, apple, lime juice, ground flaxseed, ginger, seasoning blend, hot sauce, and Worcestershire sauce in a blender; add enough water to cover
